actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to allow Federal savings and loan associations to issue reverse annuity mortgage instruments.

summary.text: Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to authorize Federal savings and loan associations to make and invest in reverse annuity mortgages. Directs the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to consider consumer safeguards in adopting regulations allowing the making of and investment in such mortgages.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to allow Federal savings and loan associations to issue reverse annuity mortgage instruments.
